p: Nowadays, there is interest in therapies that employ natural compounds which combine antioxidative and anti-inflammatory agents for systemic conditions. Many of the proposed natural agents have pleiotropic effects, such as activating antioxidant defense mechanisms while inhibiting proinflammatory signaling. Moreover, these natural products have been employed in the Asian subcontinent for centuries with little toxicity. However, the pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of these compounds must be tested in human trials before they are implemented as therapies [ 88]. We propose the use of one or more of the following antioxidant compounds for the treatment of COVID-19.
